text:
I’m going to make a bold statement, but I truly do believe in it: Liam Payne’s new single will be the biggest song from any of the One Direction guys solo careers to date.

via GIPHY

Yes, that is how much I enjoy Liam’s new single, “Familiar”; it features singer J. Balvin.

“Familiar” has a beat that is so addictive that you’re almost guaranteed to be dancing and bopping along to it all weekend long.

via GIPHY

Liam revealed earlier this week that he had a new single coming with J. Balvin with this Instagram post…

Spanish-language music have always had huge success on the charts, but more recently, efforts from Luis Fonsi and Daddy Yankee (“Despacito”) and J. Balvin’s own “Mi Gente”, have really given Spanish-language artists the mainstream limelight that they deserve.

Liam launched his solo career with the record, “Strip That Down” featuring Quavo of Migos, and later released, “Bedroom Floor”; About a month ago he released a collaboration off the Fifty Shades Freed soundtrack, “For You” with Rita Ora.

Take a listen to Liam’s new single, “Familiar” below and let us know what you think!
title: Liam Payne Releases New Single, “Familiar” Featuring J. Balvin!

meta_data.description: Liam Payne has released what I think is the best solo song from a One Direction member yet. Check out his new single, "Familiar" featuring J. Balvin
